item.title: Error with noclip
item.dc:creator: @Rozza5 Rozza5
item.description:
@Rozza5 wrote:

Hello, I downloaded Rage-Scape, and im trying to make it so players with playerrights 4 can use noclip

this will not work:

        headIcon = newheadicon2;
        updateRequired = true;
        appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
    } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("loop")
            && (playerRights == 4)) {
        resetanim = 999;
    } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("noclip")
            && (playerRights == 4)) {
        PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName
                + " tried to noclip and has been autobanned!");
        appendToBanned(playerName);
        disconnected = true;
    } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("noclip")
            && (playerRights == 4)) {
        PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName
                + " tried to cheat and has been autobanned!");
        appendToBanned(playerName);
        disconnected = true;
    } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("noclip")
            && (playerRights == 4)) {
        PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName
                + " tried to cheat and has been autobanned!");
        appendToBanned(playerName);
        disconnected = true;

any ideas?

Read full topic
